segments.text: I notice the cookie jar sitting tantalizingly open, filled to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is precariously balanced, hand reaching into the jar like he’s on a mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks up at his sister, who’s eagerly anticipating the cookies with her palm outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their teamwork is almost adorable, but I can't shake the feeling of impending doom.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he tumbles backward off that stool? It's a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The anxiety of it makes my stomach tighten as I watch them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The enchanting garden beyond the window feels like a stark contrast to this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
